snippet: The deal would end a seven-year takeover ordeal that had divided two of Germany’s most powerful families.
abstract: Volkswagen is proceeding with its deal to buy the 50.1 percent stake in Porsche's automotive business that it does not already own for 4.46 billion euros ($5.6 billion).
lead_paragraph: The deal would end a seven-year takeover ordeal that had divided two of Germany’s most powerful families.

headline.seo: VW Cleared to Buy Remaining Shares in Porsche
headline.main: Volkswagen to Buy Remaining Shares in Porsche
headline.print_headline: VW to Buy Remaining Shares In Porsche
